x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
PG owners in Hyderabad (and elsewhere) track residents, payments, complaints, and vacancies across spreadsheets, and paper. This causes missed payments, delayed maintenance, inconsistent meal plans, and poor reporting.
PGCare centralizes data and automates reminders, payments and workflows.
So start ServiceNow app for paying rent, lodging resident records, logging complaints & maintenance, managing food menus, and tracking room vacancies — giving PG owners a single place to run operations and residents a simple portal.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The ideal solution will be built using ServiceNow’s CSM and App Engine capabilities to fully digitalize PG operations.

Customer Service Management (CSM) will handle complaints and requests — each resident complaint will create a Case, which can be assigned to the PG staff or maintenance vendor for resolution and tracking.

Incident Management will be used for technical or facility issues reported by residents (like Wi-Fi or electricity problems).

App Engine will store resident, room, and payment data using custom tables, along with workflows for rent reminders and room allocation.

A Service Portal will allow residents to raise cases, check payment status, and view food or room details.

Flow Designer, Notifications, and Reports & Dashboards will automate updates, send reminders, and provide insights on occupancy, payments, and complaint trends.

This ensures an automated, transparent, and user-friendly system for both residents and PG owners.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Yes, there are a few technical dependencies for the proposed ServiceNow solution:

ServiceNow CSM and App Engine licenses are required to create custom tables, flows, and cases for managing PG operations.

Access to Service Portal for building the resident self-service interface.

Notification and Email setup for sending rent reminders, complaint updates, and acknowledgments.

(Optional) IntegrationHub if connecting to payment gateways (for online rent collection) or SMS services for alerts.

Mobile App configuration if residents or staff need to manage complaints and payments on the go.

These dependencies ensure smooth automation, communication, and integration for the complete PG management experience.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Foreseen Challenges

Data accuracy & migration: Shifting existing resident and payment data from manual records or spreadsheets into ServiceNow without errors.

User adoption: PG owners and residents may need basic training to adapt from manual to digital systems.

Integration complexity: Connecting with external payment gateways or SMS APIs may require additional setup and testing.

Access control & privacy: Ensuring residents only see their own data while owners and staff have broader access — requires careful ACL configuration.

Scalability: Handling multiple PGs or large numbers of residents efficiently as the app grows.

Connectivity: Dependence on stable internet for real-time updates and portal access.

Despite these, the challenges can be mitigated through proper planning, phased implementation, and testing within ServiceNow’s robust platform.
